PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy and Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: This is a summary description of the privacy policy...
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTENT:
Privacy and Policy - ParkingNow

At ParkingNow, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users' data. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the personal information you provide when using our platform.

1. Information Collection
We collect the personal information you provide when registering on our platform, making parking reservations, or contacting us. This includes:
- Full name
- Email address
- Vehicle information (such as the license plate)
- Geographical location (to offer nearby parking options)
- Payment information, when making transactions on the platform.

2. Use of Information
We use your personal information to:
- Manage your account and process your reservation requests
- Send you notifications and updates about the status of your reservation
- Improve the user experience on the platform.

3. Sharing Information
We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, unless necessary to comply with legal requirements or process your reservation requests.

4. Information Security
We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or alterations. However, no security system is infallible, and we cannot guarantee absolute data security.

5. Your Rights
You can access, modify, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings or by contacting us directly.

6. Policy Changes
We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. We will notify you of any significant changes via our platform or by email.
